1691630.name: DOMINUS RAGE
1691630.description:
Hardcore Beat 'Em Up is a game, created in the best traditions of old masters. Fight to defeat all your enemies.


The chaos mage Samrrr is trying to capture the floating islands of Altran. Thank's to of Morgoth's amulet, he brings Tavor back to life. The Dominus feels the moment of awakening and hurries back to Altran. Mara and Lex, two warriors of the ordered, join him.


Choose between three heroes and help them fight the evil's armies to restore the balance of the elements.
Each hero has his own special moves, magic and combo series.

The game is a hardcore Beat 'Em Up in which you need to hone your skills to cope with opponents.
Has different paths of passage.
1691630.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
